attributes.action: Police patrol when kids are on  school runs in the morning and after school
attributes.additional_details: Because this country is not what it used to be no more, our children are having there childhood robbed from them due to the high level of violence and threats that have happened recently
attributes.background: Our children to be safe from any danger and protected from any evil acts or strangers following them! Our children aren’t safe going to and from schools no more

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund security guards and CCTV on school premises & introduce new protocols
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/738547
